about_the_game:
EARLY ACCESS


Please be aware that our game is in the very early stages of development. At this point, we strongly recommend playing with a friend to fully enjoy the experience, as solo play may feel limited.

The multiplayer is all about players hosting their own rooms for others to join. So, if you're looking to jump into a game, you might need to rally some friends to host or cross your fingers that someone else has a room open. No guarantees on that front!

We have eight male characters to choose from, and a very small selection of wearable items and environment interactions. In the current state, you can expect to walk around the club, listen to music, dance, chat, as well as interact with a few interactive elements.

There is so much we want to do, and we will do our best to update it regularly. More info coming soon!

Enter the club

Step into a room filled with vibrant neon lights and intricately designed rooms that fuel your imagination and encourage immersive roleplay. Lose yourself in the cozy, colorful atmosphere as you explore the many possibilities that await.

Customization

Head to the wardrobe and choose between eight distinct male characters, each with their own allure and personality. At the moment we have a few selection of accessories, but more will come.

A social sandbox

The focus of FIAR is on social interaction and the freedom to play as you desire. Connect with fellow players who share your interests and desires. Enjoy the company of others in a judgment-free environment that celebrates diversity and self-expression.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature themes and content such as BDSM-inspired thematic elements, erotic visuals and alcohol.

name: Friends in a Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti or Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Ourobros, a vibrant and cozy club where you can hang out with friends in a unique, sandbox-style setting. Step into a colorful world where men in stylish latex outfits come together to dance, chat, and enjoy each other's company. Please keep in mind that the game is in early development.
